definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: Results These pathways were successfully ablated in 9 patients.
sentences.chinese: 结果本组10例患者，射频消融9条旁道成功。

sentences.english: The ice fields at the roof of the world are shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 这世界屋脊的冰原也在渐渐消融。

sentences.english: The ablation target site was the isthmus between tricuspid valve annulus and inferior vana cava.
sentences.chinese: 位于三尖瓣环和下腔静脉口间的峡部为消融部位。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the nursing of atrial tachyarrhythmia after radiofrequency current catheter ablation(RCCA) .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结导管射频消融治疗快速房性心律失常的护理。

sentences.english: If treatment is desired, ablative or excisional modalities are appropriate.
sentences.chinese: 如确实需要治疗，可进行消融或切除。

sentences.english: The dominant mechanism by which interventional ultrasound energy dissolves thrombi is acoustic cavitation.
sentences.chinese: 超声介入消融血栓的主要作用机制是声学空化效应。

sentences.english: Some icebergs, however, drift north to warmer climates and disintegrate.
sentences.chinese: 不过，也有一些冰山会往北漂流到温带然后消融。

sentences.english: Right-sided accessory atrioventricular pathways were ablated by radiofrequency current in 6 patients with Wolff-Parkinson-White syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 以射频电流消融6例预激综合征患者的右侧旁路。

sentences.english: To investigate the outcome of radiofrequency ablation (RFA) in treatment for liver cancer located in the second hepatic portal.
sentences.chinese: 探讨第二肝门区肝癌射频消融的治疗结局。

sentences.english: The experience of RFA in the treatment of atrial flutter in children should be accumulated.
sentences.chinese: 射频消融治疗儿童心房扑动需积累经验。

sentences.english: LITT of brain tumors need exact location.
sentences.chinese: 脑部肿瘤激光消融需要精确的定位。

sentences.english: Radiofrequency ablation is used to treat many types of liver cancer. The two most common types are
sentences.chinese: 射频消融术能够用于治疗许多类型的肝癌。

sentences.english: Radiofrequency Catheter Ablation for Idiopathic Ventricular Tachycardia of Atypical Site.
sentences.chinese: 特殊部位特发性室性心动过速的射频消融。

sentences.english: The retreat of the glaciers threatens agriculture downstream.
sentences.chinese: 冰川的消融威胁着下游的农业。

sentences.english: Focal atrial fibrillation treated by circumferential radiofrequency catheter ablation of pulmonary vein orifice.
sentences.chinese: 导管射频肺静脉口环状消融治疗局灶性心房颤动。

sentences.english: Linear ablation along the isthmus between tricuspid valve and inferior vena cava was performed.
sentences.chinese: 于右房三尖瓣环与下腔静脉之间的峡部进行线性消融。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
(literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
to freeze over/to ice over/icebound/to shelve (a proposal etc)
to dissipate everywhere (of light, sound, gas etc)
to spread out after being diluted or melted/to dissolve into a liquid
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
